name: Race_Game
description:
Difficult (?) game I made where you roam around trying to get a high score! Watch out along the way for spikes and keep your eyes on the look-out for powerups. Also be prepared to fight a boss! One checkpoint at 20000 and you will see why. Share any bugs in the comments and even your highest score, with an image link (mine is 1,897,093). Check out my other works on Newgrounds too.

Arrow keys to move and shift to boost. R to restart

Update v1.1 - fixes double hits, makes the boss more recognizable, gives you full health at boss fight start, and makes the boss bounce off spikes.
